attributes.action: Let the public decide on who should lead the country!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allowing the public to decide on who or which political party should be given an opportunity to lead the country is in keeping with democratic protocol. Surely, we the public should decide not bureacrats in suits and ties who are only deciding by default...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
